channel.title: Releases on Apache Hadoop Submarine
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on Apache Hadoop Submarine

item.title: Release 0.2.0 available
item.description: Apache Hadoop Submarine 0.2.0 is released with following features: Linkedin’s TonY runtime support in Submarine PyTorch enabled in Submarine with both YARN native service runtime (single node) and TonY runtime Support uber jar of Submarine to submit the job The YAML file to describe a job The Notebook support (by Apache Zeppelin Submarine interpreter)
